name: Zee!
description:
Zee! is a dice rolling game for ZZT v3.2. The traditional dice rolling game has been crammed into a 20,000 byte space without compromise!

Go for a high score as you score your roll in thirteen different categories!

The "Free Edition" is fully complete with the pay-only registered version existing as way to support the developer.  As a bonus, the registered version also includes an extra dice based minigame: "Petals Around The Rose".

For more ZZT worlds visit the Museum of ZZT!

Downloads available include all files needed for play including Zee! game files, The Reconstruction of ZZT, and Zeta Emulator (ver. b38). See the Zeta website for updated releases, a 32-bit Windows executable, and source for compiling under Linux.
